question1.question: What majors are there in college?

first.title: Software
first.description: creating web, mobile and digital applications, working with Python, React, Flutter, databases and Arduino.

second.title: Computer Science and Information Networks
second.description: setting up and maintaining databases (PostgreSQL, SQL Server), servers and networks, working with Django.

answer.part1: The duration of the study is
answer.part3: The study is conducted in full-time mode.

answer.part2: for the entire duration of the study.
answer.part3: You can split the payment into 3 installments:

tranche.second: 2nd installment 35% by the end of the 1st semester
tranche.third: 3rd installment 35% by the end of the 2nd semester
